    • Method Detail

      • RefreshGameList

        public void RefreshGameList()
        Update available Game List into availableGmaes
        Pre conditions:
        None
        Post conditions:
        Information of games that are waiting for players should be in availableGames List

      • CreateNewGame

        public void CreateNewGame(java.lang.String gameTitle)
        Create New Game and store in to game variable
        Parameters:
        gameTitle -
        Pre conditions:
        User should not be in any game
        Post conditions:
        User should be in game and cannot create or join to the other game until left

      • JoinGame

        public void JoinGame(int gameId)
        Join selected game
        Parameters:
        gameId -
        Pre conditions:
        User should not be in any game, Selected game must not be full or started
        Post conditions:
        User should be in game and cannot create or join to the other game until left

      • LeaveGame

        public void LeaveGame()
        Leave currently joined game
        Pre conditions:
        User must be in game
        Post conditions:
        User must not be in game
